name: ai-sdk-provider-amp-sdk
description: AI SDK v5 provider for Amp via Amp SDK (@sourcegraph/amp-sdk)
author: Ben Vargas

scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint:all && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.example:check-auth: npm run build && npx tsx examples/check-auth.ts
scripts.example:basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/basic-usage.ts
scripts.example:streaming: npm run build && npx tsx examples/streaming.ts
scripts.example:conversation: npm run build && npx tsx examples/conversation-history.ts
scripts.example:config: npm run build && npx tsx examples/custom-config.ts
scripts.example:object-basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/generate-object-basic.ts
scripts.example:object-constraints: npm run build && npx tsx examples/generate-object-constraints.ts
scripts.example:object-nested: npm run build && npx tsx examples/generate-object-nested.ts
scripts.example:abort-signal: npm run build && npx tsx examples/abort-signal.ts
scripts.example:error-handling: npm run build && npx tsx examples/error-handling.ts
scripts.example:long-running: npm run build && npx tsx examples/long-running-tasks.ts
scripts.example:session-management: npm run build && npx tsx examples/session-management.ts
scripts.example:session-validate: npm run build && npx tsx examples/session-settings-validate.ts
scripts.example:permissions: npm run build && npx tsx examples/permissions.ts
scripts.example:mcp: npm run build && npx tsx examples/mcp-integration.ts
scripts.example:toolbox: npm run build && npx tsx examples/toolbox.ts
scripts.example:logging-verbose: npm run build && npx tsx examples/logging-verbose.ts
scripts.example:logging-disabled: npm run build && npx tsx examples/logging-disabled.ts
scripts.example:logging-custom: npm run build && npx tsx examples/logging-custom-logger.ts
scripts.example:debug-json: npm run build && npx tsx examples/debug-json.ts
scripts.example:all: npm run build && npx tsx examples/check-auth.ts && npx tsx examples/basic-usage.ts && npx tsx examples/streaming.ts && npx tsx examples/conversation-history.ts && npx tsx examples/custom-config.ts && npx tsx examples/generate-object-basic.ts && npx tsx examples/generate-object-constraints.ts && npx tsx examples/generate-object-nested.ts && npx tsx examples/abort-signal.ts && npx tsx examples/error-handling.ts && npx tsx examples/long-running-tasks.ts && npx tsx examples/session-management.ts && npx tsx examples/session-settings-validate.ts && npx tsx examples/permissions.ts && npx tsx examples/mcp-integration.ts && npx tsx examples/toolbox.ts && npx tsx examples/logging-verbose.ts && npx tsx examples/logging-disabled.ts && npx tsx examples/logging-custom-logger.ts && npx tsx examples/debug-json.ts
